name: Epacse
description:
As a young wizard-in-training trapped in a cursed library with your scatterbrained mentor, use a wide range of at least one spell to escape from a horde of monsters!

Controls:

WASD to move

Space to use magic!

Developed by Omar Uraimov, Jack Vomacka, Jackson Howitt, Spencer Davis

Special thanks to Josh Fickes and Meha Magesh

Made using Kenney's Assets
